steps.description: Navigate to the project directory at ~/Home/VOIDE.
List all files and subdirectories to get an overview of the project structure.
Run a static code analysis tool (e.g., pylint or flake8) to identify potential errors in the code.
Review the output from the static analysis tool to identify specific errors or issues.
Edit the files to fix the identified errors based on the static analysis feedback.
Run the project's test suite to ensure that the fixes have not introduced new issues.
Review the test results to confirm that all tests pass successfully.
Commit the changes to the version control system if all errors are resolved.
